title: Does Fizz ultimate deal AOE damage when misses target and jumps form the floor, or not?
body:
When Fizz misses his Chum the Waters skillshot, does it deal AOE damage, or not... 

Thankyou,
iLordy

replies.body: so much bronze in this comment

> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=2WVARFAw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2014-12-24T04:39:56.768+0000)
>
> so much bronze in this comment

oi m8, at least he attempting to learn, rather than going balls to the walls with no idea what hes doing
Fizz's ultimate will always deal the same damage regardless of whether or not it hits. The only effect that 'hitting' the ultimate has is that it latches on to your target.
